name: Amanda Slunecka
text: Husband ordered pizza. We got the big box with wings. The delivery driver showed up 30 minutes after we placed our order. The box didn‚Äôt come with our wings. Husband calls right away and was told they will have their delivery driver bring ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan Rothamel
text: Still open for take out and delivery! I ordered. The small dinner box for pick up. My food was hot, ready, and accurate. I love pizza huts pan pizza. The cinnastix were bomb and the bread sticks were perfect. They had crushed red pepper ‚Ä¶More

name: Breanna Jurenic
text: Ordered a pizza last night never got delivered but charged us and no one wanted to help us even with proof that there was money taken through the bank account and a screenshot that it was delivered but we never received it. Not happy at all

name: Amber Campbell
text: We ordered to dine in. Zack was very helpful, great service! Food was ready fast... good! Love new backyard bbq chicken pizza!

name: Jason Johansen
text: The delivery drivers are always prompt and friendly

name: Krimson 1991
text: Best wings ever but service is terrible.

name: Immortal Goku789
text: The pizza was good. The service was horrible. We waited to be seated as the sign said and noone came. All we ordered was a medium supreme pizza. They only had one other customer. It seemed they are more focused on talking to each other than ‚Ä¶More

name: Jenn Toillion
text: Ordered my food for delivery long in the am before they even opened and my food arrived 25 mins late and cold! Im not sure what has changed in the last couple months but service is declining FAST!!!! never used to have this problem with Pizza Hut Anywhere else in town yes.

name: Eugene Barrette Jr
text: Can't deliver 4.1 miles from there front door would make a good pizza place maybe they should sell to someone who could sell and deliver pizza

name: Gareth Scott
text: Never met a more dedicated and positive staff. Sometimes the quality falls through, but I assure you that the staff is always looking for flaws. They would only serve food that they would to friends and family. I love pizza hut and hope it stays in our wonderful hometown for many wonderful (tasty) years.     ‚ù§Ô∏èü§§üòÅ

name: Zack Nissen
text: Just had a loaded pepperoni pizza and it was goooooooooiood I definitely recommend it

name: E W
text: Good pizza. Made our own BBQ Hawaiian Pizza. BBQ sauce, ham, pork, bacon, pineapple and onions! It was awesome!

name: Kim Stevens
text: I love the service. The salad bar is always fresh. Yummy!

name: Jodi Tusa More
text: Our family enjoyed the lunch buffet here on a Saturday afternoon. Food was great as was the price. The food on the line was replenished often and kept full. I would have rated it a 5, except the service was inconsistent. Some were good and some were not.

name: Rod Merfeld
text: The pizza was old and dry as well as the other items on the buffet.    They only had 2 pizzas out. Very dissapointing.

name: jason johansen
text: Best pizza and best delivery drivers

name: Becky Orwig
text: Made us wrong pizza to go, told us we would get free one, drive back (half hour one way), new pizza was thin & greasy, manager went back on her word for free pizza. Won't go back.

name: Jeremy Hamilton
text: Dine in not open so we left

name: Kristin Strohman
text: Buffet was awesome. Plenty of pizza. Salad bar was very good. We came to watch football while we ate. They promptly turned the channels for us   Great service.  Thank you!

name: connie simpson
text: Was great pizza, clean place, and they have $1.50 bottle coors all day every day!! The waitress was so nice and friendly too

name: David Hogan
text: Ordered the $7.99 three topping pizza and added jalapenos. When got to hotel the crust was mushy , was missing a topping. Worst pizza I have ever had at any Pizza Hut that I've been to.

name: Josh Slifer
text: Good price for buffet but they could be more on top of things when it comes to restocking the buffet.

name: uv man
text: Pizza buffet was hot and fresh. Nice salad bar. Service was great. Clean facilities.

name: patty fransan
text: Dining in is always way better than delivery,  if you want to dine out its perfect but you can't get any of the online deals so it's usually pretty spendy for a family. On the otherhand if you order online and get deals it's not really a ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Rigby
text: Food was good on the buffet... Employees need to do their jobs a little better, instead of horsing around. I had to tell an employee that there is water or pop spilled all over the counter and there was a few tables that needed to be ‚Ä¶More

name: Susan Pierce
text: Great service. Came in early on a Saturday afternoon. Our smiling, happy waitress made the visit very fun. The entire staff was so pleasant. Nacho fries are amazing. Will be back based on service alone!

name: Tate Rujawitz
text: Came thrown in the box and didn't get my sauce. The crust takes up half the damn pizza. Not happy.

name: Tim Ireland
text: Love the thin and crispy!

name: Annaliese Bennett
text: Since they opened the new store the buffet is really good, but their service and food any other time has gone way down hill. I have given them numerous times and each time they have disappointed each time.

name: Holly Urban
text: Delivery drivers are awful drivers guy almost hit my son while he was walking in cross walk because he ran a red light this is not the first time he also almost ran into us in the parking lot 2 weeks ago! I've complained to management before about him when is enough enough. He is going to end up killing a child :(

name: Aiden Cady
text: Dont know how to fill buffet at all waited hour and nothing

name: Samantha Ramirez
text: Awesome buffet....clean but could use a little work on quicker restocking buffet line

name: Stefanie Henning
text: Rude staff.  Advertised $4.99 plus drink for buffet online.... Wouldn't honor it.  And there were 3 pieces of bite size pizza on the buffet when we went through.  Will not be back.  Ever.  I'd give it zero stars if I could.

name: Mona Boyd
text: Nice lunch good service wish they offered more evening buffets

name: Amber Marquardt
text: Jajaja bs

name: Penny Williams
text: They couldn't keep up with the buffet very well cause was busy but other than that pretty good

name: Cheri
text: Had to wait a little bit to get some variety of pizza and pasta but they filled it pretty quick and love the fact they hire special needs people to clear tables

name: Shaun Christiansen
text: Never answer the phone for carry out. and I know its not busy there.

name: Justin Brown
text: Every single time I have ordered here it hasn't been correct when picked up. Very disappointed in this establishment. If I could I would give a zero star.

name: Dory Hudson
text: Pizza sucks doesn't even use real cheese but salad bar good for 3.00

name: Christian K Samsel
text: $13 minimum for delivery? Not about to spend $13 just for my lunch break.  Two people can go out to eat for that.

name: Michael Simmons
text: It's Pizza Hut same food everywhere nice place clean friendly staff

name: Laura Gory
text: Do not eat here! The people working there hang out in the street like drug dealers and act like addicts. The food is OK- but definitely not what you would expect from a real Pizza Hut. It sullies what is usually a good town.

name: sherry juilfs
text: Great buffet. Great service

name: Dawn DeBoer
text: Not enough seating space and available food was sparse at the buffet.  I will give them a 2nd chance before I give them a better rating.

name: Robert Young
text: 1st time I have ever had a Pizza place ever say "sorry we are out of mushrooms" How do out run out in a Pizza Hut?? Delivered to our table, asked us if we wanted a to go box right away, and never said another word to us. Soggy crust, not much toppings, just an all around bad experience. Would not recommend this to anyone at this time.

name: eieio 1
text: Slow service, almost nonexistent. Waited for food 45 minutes. Forgot to put order in.

name: Momma's Acct
text: Horrible service, slow and never came to refill drinks or check on us at all after our food finally came out.

text: Great customer service, delicious pizza

name: Joe Bolluka
text: I like the new store. Very clean and modern.

name: Ange Sonius
text: Over priced for what we got.

name: Kat2k6
text: Ever since they changed locations their phone number does not work for them and it‚Äôs ridiculous that I have to order online to get anything. This Pizza Hut has always been horrible

name: Matthew McCrea
text: It was an o.k. experience, pretty typical of any pizza hut.  The manager was a bit moody.  We just ordered online and did a pick up.

name: pbi Fishing
text: This place is great I love this pizza hut

name: Alax Johnson
text: Smelled like cigarette smoke outside & inside.wings were hot but heavy vinegar taste.pizza was over cooked & mediocre tasting.will not go there again.

name: thomas murray
text: Love the pizza keep up the good work

name: William Walrath
text: The piece is always good but the service is always bad and the place of those dirty in Emmitsburg.

name: Jonny Boy Kreiss
text: Wasn't impressed with the pizza, fair Wings and pasta.

name: Duane Wiggins
text: Was there for a little over 30 min and no pizzas where brought out for the buffet

name: gothelder
text: Tiny little place.  Food was good. Clean.  Service was nice.

name: Kaye Rickman
text: Lunch buffet on a Friday at noon and there was barely any hot food on the buffet and nothing was brought out for the 45 min we stayed.  The place was 3/4 full with everyone sitting & waiting for pizza/cheese sticks to arrive.  Pathetic!!!!!  Will NOT go back!

name: Chuck Garrison
text: Google says they are 3.7 miles from my location so I call and tell them I'm a trucker and need delivery. I was told no because I'm apparently over some line they can't cross! Guess you don't want money or good reviews!

name: Casey Henke
text: The serving staff was great but my peperonie lovers was more like a stuff crust grease pizza and the crust was soggy

name: Michelle Vradenburg
text: Very pleasant amitsphere. Very good service and friendly people.

text: Hey!; it's Pizza Hut so, it was fast, delicious and gave me heartburn for an hour.
